title: Eke vrndAvana
sahitya:
Eke vrndAvana sAku gOkulavAsa EkE bandello uddhava 
sAku snEhada mAtanEka mahimanu tAnu A kubujeyanu kUDida uddhava


caraNam 1    billu biLinayyana bEDe nage nuDi nODa illadandAyidalla 
ellarindagalisida krUra akrUranu vallabhana oidanalla mallaranu 
mardisuta mAva kamsana konda mAdhavana tandu tOrisai uddhava
    caraNam 2    anudinadoLAdarisi adharAmrtavanittu inayavadananu mAtili manasu 
marmava tiLida manasija pitana sukhavu manasijana kELiyalli 
kanasinali kaNDa terayitAtana kANade badukuva bharavase hE uddhava
    caraNam 3    karuNanidhiyemboru kapaTa nATakadarasu sarasa virasava mADida 
smarisidavaranu kAiva biruduLLa shrI ramaNa maredu mathureya sErida 
parama bhaktara priya purandara viTTalana oDagUDisai kOvida uddhava
